Not being nitpicky, but as an engineer who understands physics and math, Sam's wings in the scene at the very end of this trailer where Sam sliced the car in two, those wings should've been more rigid instead of flappy. If they're loose or flappy, the physics wouldn't be right for "vibranium wings" to generate enough "slicing" force. 

AND a simple somersault is also not sufficient to generate the "slicing" force either, it has to gain momentum first and be at a certain speed, like a chainsaw. It should've been a double or even triple somersault to slice a car coming at you in speed.

I know it's suspension of disbelief but IMHO it's more easily swallowed if the physics is correct or it's explained the wings is charged with some kind of energy.
